review: so far I am very pleased with the Fire TV Stick.

review: I prefer Chromecast over the Fire Stick. Fire Stick constantly lags when I try to stream from Hulu or Netflix. It's absolutely annoying. I've tried everything from resetting the internet settings to a resetting the fire stick. I will not be recommending this to any of my friends/family. My Chromecast still runs flawlessly though and I've had it for 2 years! I've had the Fire Stick for 4 months.
author: tpan

review: Great for the price, but the user interface just seems like it puts you through a lot more steps than is necessary. Reminds me of the old iPhone interface actually, with how you need to exit out all the way back to the start screen to get from one thing to most any other things.
